Hardball: New Tenn. bill would push abortions into spotlight Season 2012 : Episode 0319 March 19: A new bill introduced in Tennessee would require the state to publish a list of every doctor who’s performed an abortion and publish statistics on women who’ve had them. Aired: 19/03/12 Views: 2 Related Links: Politics news from msnbc.com Read the latest posts on the Hardball blog First Read keeps you up to speed
